title: The Devil’s Promise
description: With a war brewing and ties being severed they’ll need the Devil’s promises now more than ever.They say better the devil you know than the one you don't but when his facade starts cracking and bitter truths are revealed they are forced to ask themselves ...Are the Devil's promises true or have they been hand-fed lies to ensure their loyalty to him?Their family ties are being tested; their bonds are being stretched and all of their lives are at stake.Can they make it out on top? Or will they be left to pick up the fragmented pieces of their lives and climb their way out of Hell, leaving the Devil and all of his promises behind?
author: K.B. Saint
